lines.text: You know, I've always had this feeling there was some greater purpose.
No, that's just ordinary paranoia. Everybody in the Universe has that.
Well if everyone has it, then perhaps it means something...
Life. Don't talk to me about life.
So this is it... we're going to die!
I think you ought to know I'm feeling very depressed.
I'd much rather be happy than right, any day.
No. That's where it all breaks down, of course.
